name: World Heroes Perfect
overview: World Heroes Perfect (ワールドヒーローズ パーフェクト) is a 1995 fighting arcade game developed and published by ADK with the assistance of SNK. It was originally released for the Neo Geo MVS arcade cabinet on May 25, 1995. It is the sequel to the 1994 fighting arcade game World Heroes 2 Jet, and is the fourth and final title of the World Heroes series.
